name: crlf
author: Cristi Constantin
description: Cr;Lf; blog powered by Eleventy and TailwindCSS

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run css-build && npm run css-optim && eleventy && du -h -d 1 website
scripts.clean: rm -r website/drafts/ website/log/ website/mem/ website/tags/ website/topics/
scripts.css-build: NODE_ENV=production tailwindcss --minify -i postcss/style.pcss -o css/styles.css && ls -lah css/
scripts.css-optim: csso css/styles.css --stat --force-media-merge --comments none --output css/styles.css && ls -lah css/
